sense.name: make fit for a specific purpose
sense.examples: The company has tailored many models designed to fit the needs of the everyday person. Applications have to be tailored over and over to new requirements during its lifetime. They really tried to tailor the trips for us. It's a community about a great philosophy that you can tailor to needs of baby.

sense.name: create clothing
sense.examples: When in doubt order one size up, that way you can tailor the dress to fit. If it's in good condition, a seamstress will tailor it to fit your body. All interior seams have been masterfully tailored.
